title: MiTTY
description: MiiTY (sometimes MiTY) means "Mine (ii) Then Yours".  You may modify and distribute only with explicit permission from the author while the license is in effect. The license only stays in effect for 90 days from a release/licensing date.  After, you can do what you want (similar to WTFPL).

I consider it ethical to edit the licensing date on each major version release. For example, when the first version of your program is released, the licensing date could be 20/11/13. When the next version is released, you could update the licensing date to 29/11/13.
